set(THIS_PROJECT oculus)

project( ${THIS_PROJECT} )

	../../SDKs/OculusSDK/LibOVRKernel/Src/Util/Util_Watchdog.h

source_group("Util" FILES ${SourceGroup_Util})


# Support unity build with uber files
set(NoUberFile ${SourceGroup_GL} ${SourceGroup_LibOVRKernel} ${SourceGroup_Logging} ${SourceGroup_Root} ${SourceGroup_TinyXml} ${SourceGroup_Util}  )


set (SOURCES
	${NoUberFile}
)
#END-FILE-LIST

# Disable compilation of .mm files
foreach(file ${SOURCES})
	if (${file} MATCHES ".*\\.\\mm$")
		set_source_files_properties( ${file} PROPERTIES HEADER_FILE_ONLY TRUE)
	endif ()
endforeach()

add_definitions(/EHsc)

include_directories( ${SDK_DIR}/OculusSDK/LibOVR/Include )
include_directories( ${SDK_DIR}/OculusSDK/LibOVRKernel/Src )

add_library( ${THIS_PROJECT} STATIC ${SOURCES})

SET_PLATFORM_TARGET_PROPERTIES( ${THIS_PROJECT} )
